messages.subject: ANOTHER SAMURAI WEBSITE
messages.msgSnippet: Dear All, As the list seems a little quiet of late I thought I d put out this link I ve just discovered.  I was looking for any info on the Doi Shinryu school
messages.messageBody:
Dear All,

As the list seems a little quiet of late I thought I'd put out this link
I've just discovered. I was looking for any info on the Doi Shinryu school
of Hizen swordsmiths, but didn't find any. However, I found numerous very
readable websites, of which this is but one more germain to our list:

http://shinto.muso.ryu.en.wikimiki.org/

Best regards,

Barry Thomas.
